bio: Faux Kappa turned Wicked! He's always trying to drag people down the river to their doom.

soultimate.name: Mega Wave
soultimate.description: Summons a water tornado that traps foes in the sea.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
skill.name: Seeing Red

name: Mad Kappa
